H0.text: who captained the first european ship to sail around the tip of africa. Vasco da Gama

H1.text: who captained the first european ship to sail around the tip of africa. Ferdinand Magellan

H2.text: who captained the first european ship to sail around the tip of africa. Henry the Navigator

H3.text: who captained the first european ship to sail around the tip of africa. Bartolomeu Dias

A4.text: Bartolomeu Dias became the first European navigator to round the southern tip of Africa in 1488.

A5.text: Vasco da Gama used Dias's discoveries to establish a sea route between Europe and Asia.
